repnme.cdata!: India - Fourth Trombay Fertilizer Expansion Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project would include
            construction of additional facilities at FCI's plant
            located at Trombay, Maharashtra, to increase the production
            capacity of nitric acid by 250,000 TPY and nitrophosphate
            fertilizers by 355,000 TPY, and improvement of capacity
            utilization at existing FCI and FACT fertilizer plants,
            including plants about to be commissioned.
